alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 23 at 1:44PM EST until February 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 19.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 19.5 feet and begin rising again tomorrow evening. Further rises are expected Friday with the next round of expected rainfall. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you are in the advisory area, remain alert to possible flooding or the possibility of the advisory being upgraded to a warning. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 11 PM on February, 23rd.
